answerText: Robert Herrick [10] Herrick was among this group of poets, sometimes called the Sons of Ben and known for their loyalty to Charles I. It included Richard Lovelace and Thomas Carew.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Illinois A and Missouri State A and University of South Carolina A | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: He instructs the title character to "get up, get up for shame" in his poem "Corinna's Going A-Maying."  [10] Name this poet of "Delight in Disorder" and Hesperides who might be better known for a poem in which he instructs the title characters to "gather ye rosebuds while ye may."
